name: Someshwara Beach
description: Famous for the Rudra Shile (large rocks) and the ancient Somanatha Temple. It's a beautiful, clean beach, perfect for a peaceful walk. The view from the top of the rocks during sunset is unforgettable.

name: Udupi Sri Krishna Matha
description: A world-renowned temple dedicated to Lord Krishna. The atmosphere here is deeply spiritual. Don't miss the unique Kanakana Kindi, a window through which Lord Krishna is said to have given darshan to his devotee, Kanakadasa.

name: St. Mary's Islands
description: A geological monument known for its unique columnar basaltic lava formations. A short boat ride from Malpe harbor takes you to this stunning island. It feels like stepping into a different world.

name: Forum Fiza Mall
description: A popular shopping destination in Mangalore with a wide range of retail stores, a food court, and a cinema. A great place to spend an afternoon.

name: City Centre Mall
description: One of the largest malls in the region, offering a vast selection of brands, dining options, and entertainment facilities right in the heart of the city.
